hello.action:
Hello, world!
Welcome to the terminal!
hello.help:
Usage: hello [--name <name>]

Prints a greeting. Use the --name flag to personalize the greeting.

--name.description: Specify a name for a personalized greeting

welcome.action:
Welcome to the Ubuntu Terminal!
Type help to get a list of all available commands in this prototype.
welcome.help:
Usage: welcome

Displays the welcome message for the terminal.
